___alwaysMultiline.description: If true then all comments are multiline, else non-functions are single line

___autoInsertHeader.description: If true then file header insertion is triggered by typing the value of `headerbegin`

___autoPrefixOnEnter.description: If true then onEnterRules are added

___neverAskTemplate.description: If true then never asks to select default template

___templates.description: Templates keyed by language id - each template is an array of strings containing text and optional '${}' fields

___*.description: Default template used when no language id specified

___params.description: Parameters used to populate '${}' fields in a template. Contains groups of params keyed by language id

___*.description: Default params used regardless of which language id is used by the current editor

___returnFormat.description: Format of the @return tag, using ${type} field

___autoInsert.description: If true then insertion is triggered by typing the value of `commentbegin` or `headerbegin`

___allowOptionalArgs.description: If true, allows the '?' prefix for optional function args in @param tag

___paramFormat.description: Format of the @param tag, using ${name} and ${type} fields

___commentdescription.description: Initial text added to comment description
